author: maxb
msg: Fix issue #2085 - Allow mod_authz_svn groups to contain other groups
(group_contains_user): Make into a trivial wrapper around...
(group_contains_user_internal): ...this new function, which contains all the
old logic of group_contains_user, and additionally recurses to check
membership in nested groups. Uses a hash to safely handle
